item.description:
On discutera nos expériences des fêtes et autres sujets qui se présenteront.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Remember that the new year means that dues (la cotisation) start anew!

Dues for this group first are used to pay for the use of the Meetup website (the source of most of our members), a fee that Pam pays monthly. Then, they pay for incidentals like paper plates and other disposable servingware for our popular Soirées potluck (to make hosting an easier experience for our hosts) and occasional tips for our friendly servers at the Barley Pub. After Meetup fees and incidentals have been covered, dues money may be used to purchase a bottle of wine for a soirée, food for our September fête d'anniversaire, or des petits cadeaux for special occasions.

Please consider showing your commitment to -- and ongoing support of -- this group by paying $20 in advance for 2008. **If at least 10 members pay their dues in advance, then Pam will host a private wine tasting for those members à la maison over the coming months.**

Promis, juré ! Merci d'avance.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the red and white Meetup sign on the table!
item.why: Venez boire une bonne bière (ou un vin, ou un RC Cola -- oui, ça existe encore au Barley Pub), et discuter avec nous !

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Reunion de fevrier
